## ArrayOperationInfo type

`ArrayOperationInfo` represents the OperationInfo for the JSONArray.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ArrayOperationInfo = AddOpInfo | RemoveOpInfo | MoveOpInfo;
```
